sentences.sContent: This guy should be famous for scoring the first goal of the 2010 World Cup...
sentences.sContent_eng: This guy should be famous for scoring the first goal of the 2010 World Cup...
sentences.sCn: 这位哥们会因为打进了2010南非世界杯第一个进球而成名。。。。。。

sentences.sContent: This guy should be famous for scoring the first goal of the 2010 World Cup...but it's been overshadowed by the celebration.
sentences.sContent_eng: This guy should be famous for scoring the first goal of the 2010 World Cup...but it's been overshadowed by the celebration.
sentences.sCn: 这位哥们会因为打进了2010南非世界杯第一个进球而成名。。。。。。但是他的光芒可能被进球庆祝夺走。
